bibl.title: Chartulae. Festschrift für Wolfgang Speyer. JAC. Ergänzungsband. 28 (Münster, 1998) pp. 14-29 et pl. 1.
bibl.note: P. Med. Inv. 71.58 (= S.B. XVI, 12222) might possibly find its setting in the genre of ancient literature known as apotelesmatographia. - Improved transcription, translation, line-by-line commentary.
BRASHEAR William M., P. Med. Inv. 71.58: Another Apotelesmatikon?
Chartulae. Festschrift für Wolfgang Speyer = JAC. Ergänzungsband 28 (Münster, 1998) pp. 14-29 et pl. 1.
